aboutMe.sectionText:
Systems Analyst graduated from the Federal Institute of Education, Science and Technology of Bahia (IFBA). Currently, I work as a Project Lead and Senior Mobile Engineer at Petize. I am a professional passionate about teamwork, believing that team well-being and productivity go hand in hand.

I also have experience with Real-Time Systems, Navigation APIs, Firebase, Remote Flags, Flavors, Cloud Functions, AWS Ecosystem, CI/CD, and performance monitoring with error collection.

projects.helperText: The projects in this section do not include experiences in the traditional market, only projects I have developed or contributed to.

pauliceia.description: Platform aimed at collaboratively mapping the history of São Paulo from 1870 to 1940.

bisnez.description: Social network for entrepreneurs, primarily focused on providing support in the early stages.

estados_municipios.description: Package created to abstract the use of the IBGE API for obtaining states and municipalities.

internet_builder.description: Package to introduce reactivity to the user's network connection status.

cobrasescadas.description: Two-player game with the goal of reaching position 100 on the board while avoiding map obstacles.

petize.role: Project Lead and Mobile Senior Engineer
petize.description: I lead the development of some company projects, both on the web and mobile (Android/iOS), and organize product backlogs. Additionally, I work as a Senior Mobile Developer using Flutter and, when needed, provide support to the team in other areas.

ifba.description: Development and maintenance of Bisnez with Flutter, a social network focused on entrepreneurship available for Android and iOS.

colégio integral.description: I worked on the implementation of the first Qmágico system in Bahia. Additionally, I provided user support, maintained computers, and performed daily database backups.

ifba.course: Technologist in Analysis and Systems Development

mains.title: Main
mains.description: Technologies I use on a daily basis.
